divs: Sighting DetailsSitting in the yard. Saw a light approach from the northeast. Thought it was bird. Then quickly realized it wasn't. It stopped, did a few maneuvers,then quickly left towards the Northwest. Much faster then a plane. And performed like nothing I have EVER seen!!
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been no other sightings in Somerset
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: Saw light approach from ne.watched it maneuver for a time. Saw it leave towards nw.
